Unlike anything you can find today, Sex World is 1970's "Porn With A Plot."
This is a XXX movie that actually has a story line, and "better than porn" acting!
Be aware- This DVD was poorly dubbed from film, so it has a mismatched synch with the audio and video.
I encourage you to actually leave the volume up, and watch this film as a full movie, don't just fast forward to the "good parts" you will miss the beauty of a plot line in porn!
People from different walks of life visit an Adult Only fantasy theme park. The park is focused on the guests inner most sexual desires, kind of like "Fantasy Island" (a TV show from the 70's)You almost expect Mr. Roarke and Tattoo to greet the guests at any moment.
On the bus ride from the airport, some guests have graphic flash backs to sexual experiences from home, while talking to fellow travelers, about why they are going.
Once at Sex World, the guests are instructed to be honest with the staff about what gets them excited, even if it is a culturally taboo subject (for the era) interracial sex, power, lesbian, incest, voyeurism, exhibitionism, cheating, threesomes, no topic is off limits, for their desires. The staff uses the guests admitted lusts, and also covertly gather additional information to uncover the guests secret desires.
Sex World then creates the environment for the guests to be immersed in their deepest most erotic fantasies. Like Fantasy Island, some unsuspecting guests are surprised by the fantasy that is provided to them.
I recommend this movie! Watch the full movie and you may be surprised at how enjoyable a real film with graphic sex can be!

As was mentioned before. The one thing I found extremely annoying about this movie was it's constantly jumping from scene to scene. The sex was hot, the recording was good and clear, but whenever a good scene began, before you really get a chance to really get into it, the scene suddenly jumps right into something totally non related. In an adult film, this is one fo the worst things that can be done, I found it frustrating and it spoiled a lot of what would have been otherwise very hot scenes. This is an adult movie that you'd want more for the storyline which wasn't bad. I just wish they would have spent less time interrupting the sex scenes.

A few years back anytime i was on Amazon I'd get a recommended offer for the limited edition BR of Sex World at the time i had no idea that any home video distributor was actually putting in a effort to restore classic 35mm adult films on blu ray
Needless to say i passed countless times while the limited BR was still the original SRP
Then i discovered Vinegar Syndrome
This company is fantastic they are on par with Shout/Scream Factory as far as thinking outside the box

VCX is a classic adult film distributor (There digital transfer are hit and miss very much like Caballero)

Sex World Is Definitely For Adults! Welcome to Sex World; the chartered bus that was waiting for you at International Airport has brought you to this hidden retreat where you are free to indulge in your wildest fantasies. Sex World provided the stimulus, the partners, the time and the atmosphere to explore any and all areas of sexual gratification, free from hang-ups and outmoded attitudes of our present Victorian society. As you can see, our lucky guests enjoy themselves, each other, and our incomparable facilities for an entire week of unabated physical fulfillment!

Wow I'm surprised that no one else seems to rate this as average as it is.  The transfer does look amazing, which is nice since you get some cool scenery around the Bay Area and being able to see the full film grain of an old 70s adult classic is always exciting.  Trouble is, I was surprised at how much this movie jumps around and breaks up the action.  The flesh that's there looks good (especially the girl-girl scenes and there are many of those), but it seemed like not much stays on screen long enough to get really into it, and there was far too much missionary position for my tastes (which is hard to capture anything but soft core footage, not to mention the women mostly lie still).  Not the hottest performances I've ever seen... and I can't believe I'm about to type this, but the story often got in the way.

This is not a review as we have many wonderful reviewers here at Amazon, far better than I. This is simply a statement on the video quality of this presentation. If you love Sex World, as I always have, you will be pleased with this spectacular remastering. It is not perfect, of course, as the original celluloid film elements are not perfect. However, the color is crisp and clean and bright and the definition is excellent for a film of this era and I didn't find it too lacking in grain (as some of these new remasters are) or stripped of fine detail. If you love schlock horror, B moves, soft-core and hard-core pornography from the golden age (for people like me that is the sixties and seventies) then you have probably been very disappointed to see the mistreatment of so many of the old films, as I have, especially since they brought out the glorious 1080p televisions and blu-ray machines that made all those old VHS tapes look so very terrible. This film happens to be one of those lucky movies that has gotten the star treatment with a full restoration and, consequently, it looks wonderful in full HD and sounds better than ever. Good luck in finding what you are looking for.

Vu en salle (en V.F.)  sa sortie dcale dbut des annes quatre vingt, ce film ne m'avait pas vraiment tout  fait emball; En revanche, le redcouvrir aujourd'hui dans cette superbe dition Blu-ray me satisfait grandement et s'impose enfin  moi comme un authentique classique du genre mme s'il peut, par moment, inviter  une lgre somnolence car tant trs 'cool' et un rien dcousu dans son volution.. Ceci dit, l'histoire axe sur la concrtisation du fantasme des protagonistes mnage de belles surprises, le tout s'avrant esthtique, sensible, sduisant et de bon got (Anthony Spinelli est dou comme tout amateur le sait), la distribution comme l'interprtation s'affirmant de haut niveau avec divers intervenants bien connus et talentueux:  ce propos John Leslie assez nuanc est  saluer; mais plus encore, Sharon Thorpe don't c'est l'un de ses derniers rles stupfie par son jeu d'actrice absolument remarquable et son altire beaut. Sans tre rellement passionnant MAIS intressant, ce film luxueux, particulier (assez ludique et convivial) saura sduire l'amateur plus sensible  la sensualit et aux comportements humains ralistes qu' l'outrance souvent gratuite ou grotesque inexistante ici. Bonne vision  tous!

[dition limite de qualit: Blu ray au rendu image et son tout  fait excellent, les supplments tant intressants mais ptissant sur les interviews d'une image plutt mdiocre et en basse dfinition ce qui surprend un peu.. ; Le DVD prsente une trs bonne qualit tant sur le film 'principal' que sur sa version 'soft' propose en supplment et qui sans tre inutile n'apporte pas grand chose; les autres supplments sont identiques  ceux du Blu ray. Enfin, le CD reprend rigoureusement la B.O fort honnte du film : un Bon bonus. Donc une dition Vinegar syndrome de valeur (limite  1500 exemplaires) mais sans pour autant atteindre les sommets de certaines ditions Distribpix (agrmentes de sous titres) don't le travail ditorial sur 'Barbara Broadcast' de Metzger, par exemple, laisse pantois par la richesse des supplments offerts]

Back in 1973 Yul Brynner starred in Westworld, an amusement park for rich vacationers where you live out your fantasies through the use of robots.
In 1978 the adult film industry came out with their spinoff idea called Sexworld, with indulgent escapades.

The biggest difference was in the earlier film there was continuity of a story line.  The 1978 film has cut up clips scattered at you like a shotgun, which is to say it is hard to tell which chopped up clip fits with a later in the film other chopped up clip, and none of the clips last long enough to be stimulating.  Just like trying to watch eight or nine movies simultaneously by flipping through the channels.  You never really get to see enough of any of the ones you watch that way.

For the brief glimpses of what you barely get to see, some of it could have amounted to being worth watching, but theres not enough time for that.  Here comes another clip of something else.

I might have liked Sexworld enough to give it a higher rating, but Im not a teenage nerd that just got home from the chess club.  Even then there are better adult films even here on Amazon.  But like humor or religion, each individual interprets their own version of what to keep and what to toss.

I was very pleasantly surprised by Sex World. Its one of the best adult films ever made. It has very good performances, direction, production, interestingly choreographed sex scenes, stunningly sexy women with natural beauty and great music. It almost felt like a 70s Hollywood film with explicit sex scenes. I agree with one reviewer who criticized the fact that some of the sex scenes get interrupted just as you're getting into them by something else non related but in a way its one of the things that keeps you interested in watching the entire film. The 70s were definitely the golden age of porn and its a real shame that its a bygone era along with the naturally beautiful women that have voluptuously gorgeous bodies and pubic hair. Times really have changed. I give it a 4.5/5.
This one took me back to my childhood - based loosely on the Michael Crichton film Westworld, only in the adult realm, it worked well.

A nice takeoff of the Westworld movie.  It was more hardcore than I was expecting (Blu-ray version), but the acting was decent and there are multiple storylines to follow.  Even the production quality isn't bad for the time period.
